Method Details

__init__(self, model, bvhFile, samplePeriod, conversionFactor)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct BVH exporter.

Parameters:
  • model - Body model to save.
  • bvhFile - File to write to.
  • samplePeriod - The time between frames in the BVH output.
  • conversionFactor - Scale factor to apply to position values, e.g. to convert meters to centimeters use conversionFactor=100.
Overrides: object.__init__

Instance Variable Details

conversionFactor

Scale factor to apply to position values, e.g. to convert meters to centimeters use conversionFactor=100.

The number of frames that will be exported.
